title: NatWest Group appoints former Amex exec Ruchika Panesar as India country head
description: As country head of India, Panesar will be based in Gurugram and will spearhead the design and execution of strategic initiatives in collaboration with senior leaders across the Bank, with an emphasis on delivering world class experiences for our customers. Ruchika will be Chair of the India Management Committee and will report directly to the group chief information officer, Scott Marcar, the statement added.
